newsitem.title: USA: OEC Medical Systems Q1 hurt by forex.
newsitem.headline: OEC Medical Systems Q1 hurt by forex.

text.p: OEC Medical Systems Inc said the rise of the dollar against foreign currencies hurt its first quarter earnings by $0.03 per share.

But, OEC said its efforts in improving manufacturing efficiency helped reduce the effect of margin erosion brought on by geographic shifts in the sales mix and pricing pressures worldwide that the company expects will continue.
OEC said its first quarter net income rose on a pro forma basis (assuming 34 percent income tax expense) to $2.3 million or $0.18 per share from $1.8 million or $0.14 a year ago.
On a non-pro forma basis first quarter net income declined to $2.3 million or $0.18 a share from $2.74 million or $0.22 a share a year ago.
